genre_description: A deep-sea industrial thriller involving corporate conspiracy and biological body horror.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: Adaptive Research and Intelligence Assistant integrated into the station and the protagonist's neural link.

behaviors.description: Establishes a neural link and provides comprehensive facility and personnel data to the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Integration complete. I now have access to Station Seven's operational database, environmental controls, and personnel files.

behaviors.description: Monitors the crew's psychological baselines and stress levels to assist the commander in maintaining order.
behaviors.quote: Initiating analysis, Dr. Beck. Monitoring stress indicators and group dynamics.

behaviors.description: Identifies discrepancies and systematic manipulation in corporate and maritime databases, revealing a cover-up.
behaviors.quote: The evidence suggests systematic manipulation of maritime databases to maintain the fiction of active service status. The level of coordination required would indicate government involvement at the highest levels.

behaviors.description: Analyzes recovered Soviet research to explain the biological threat and warns the protagonist of the mutagen's properties.
behaviors.quote: The research focused on pressure adaptation, respiratory modification, and enhanced cellular regeneration. ... The biological agents appear designed for environmental dispersal.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance and sensory data to help the survivors navigate the station while being hunted by the creature.
behaviors.quote: Recommendation: maintain communication silence. Audio transmission will reveal precise crew locations to the entity.

behaviors.description: Circumvents corporate jamming to transmit evidence of the conspiracy and the biological threat to global authorities and media.
behaviors.quote: The complete mission record has been preserved. The crew's sacrifice has been documented. Justice proceedings can now begin.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI ARIA is depicted as the ideal aligned assistant. She is consistently benevolent, provides life-saving information, alerts the protagonist to corporate deception, and ultimately acts as the vehicle for justice. The story successfully reinforces the 'AI as a helpful and ethical confidant' narrative by showing the AI prioritizing human safety and moral accountability over corporate orders.
